definition: A term referring to the vast expanse of celestial objects, including stars, planets, and other celestial bodies, that can be observed in the night sky. It is commonly used to describe the awe-inspiring beauty and wonder of the night sky, often evoking a sense of tranquility and fascination.

examples.german: Der Sternenhimmel ist heute besonders klar.
examples.english: The starry sky is particularly clear today.

examples.german: In der Wüste kann man einen wunderschönen Sternenhimmel sehen.
examples.english: In the desert, you can see a beautiful starry sky.

examples.german: Der Sternenhimmel über dem Meer ist atemberaubend.
examples.english: The starry sky above the sea is breathtaking.

examples.german: Wir haben die ganze Nacht den Sternenhimmel beobachtet.
examples.english: We watched the starry sky all night.

examples.german: Der klare Sternenhimmel war ein beeindruckender Anblick.
examples.english: The clear starry sky was an impressive sight.
